alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Marion; McPherson; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:56PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern McPherson, northeastern Reno, western Harvey and west central Marion Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 956 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Inman, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Mcpherson, Hesston, Halstead, Moundridge, Inman, Buhler, Burrton, Galva, Goessel and Mcpherson Airport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 39 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central and central Kansas.
